attributes.action: Forbid councils and housing associations from dissallowing people with pets to live in properties
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Pet owners are experiencing difficulties finding rented accommodation that accepts pets.

Many council and housing association tenancies forbade the keeping of pets which often means dogs and cats are abandoned and the stray animal problem just worsens. Let animals live out their lives within happy families who can control them and don't let them be strays on the street that become a danger and hygiene issue.

To many a pet is just like a child and you wouldn't discriminate agaist someone with a child.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
